verses.verse: Woe <WH1945> to them that are at ease<WH7600> in Zion,<WH6726> and trust<WH982> in the mountain<WH2022> of Samaria,<WH8111> which are named<WH5344> chief<WH7225> of the nations,<WH1471> to whom the house<WH1004> of Israel<WH3478> came!<WH935>

That drink<WH8354> wine<WH3196> in bowls,<WH4219> and anoint<WH4886> themselves with the chief<WH7225> ointments:<WH8081> but they are not<WH3808> grieved<WH2470> for<WH5921> the affliction<WH7667> of Joseph.<WH3130>

Shall horses<WH5483> run<WH7323> upon the rock?<WH5553> will one plow<WH2790> there with oxen?<WH1241> for<WH3588> ye have turned<WH2015> judgment<WH4941> into gall,<WH7219> and the fruit<WH6529> of righteousness<WH6666> into hemlock: <WH3939>
